pylayers.antprop.slab.Interface.RT¶

Interface.RT(metalic=False)[source]¶

evaluate Reflection and Transmission matrix

R = matrix(R_o & 0\0 & R_p) T = matrix(T_o & 0\0 & T_p)

Notes

R : np.array (nf , nt , 2, 2) T : np.array (nf , nt , 2, 2)
